Give a float number :100
0110110010000000
Give a float number :0.25
0010100000000000
100.25
0110110010001000


Give a float number :100
0110110010000000
Give a float number :0.245
0010011110101110
100.245
0110110010000111


Give a float number :1.03     
0011100000111101
Give a float number :-1.03
1011100000111101
0
0000000000000000


Give a float number :50
0110010010000000
Give a float number :0.5
0011000000000000
50.5
0110010010100000


Give a float number :50
0110010010000000
Give a float number :0.49
0010111110101110
50.49
0110010010011111


0111011111111111->both


0111011111111111,1111011111111111
